languages.text: Народ поражен вниманием Вольного Торговца и с благоговением следит за тем как Лорд-капитан обходит соперников и побеждает в гонке. Репутация Вольного Торговца растет, как среди черни, так и среди союзников.

Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.
languages.original_text: Народ поражен вниманием Вольного Торговца и с благоговением следит за тем как Лорд-капитан обходит соперников и побеждает в гонке. Репутация Вольного Торговца растет, как среди черни, так и среди союзников.

traits.locale_text: Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.
The people are stunned by the Rogue Trader's attention and warmly welcome the Lord Captain's envoys.

Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.

languages.text: Surpris que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} s'intéresse à l'événement, les spectateurs ébahis assistent à la victoire écrasante {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} face aux autres concurrents. Sa réputation auprès du peuple comme de ses alliés en ressort grandie.
languages.original_text: Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.

traits.locale_text: Surpris que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} s'intéresse à l'événement, les spectateurs ébahis assistent à la victoire écrasante {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} face aux autres concurrents. Sa réputation auprès du peuple comme de ses alliés en ressort grandie.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の動向に唖然としていた民衆は、ロード・キャプテンが他の競争者を抜き去り、レースで勝利するのを畏敬の念を持って見守る。自由開拓者の評判は、庶民の間でも{mf|彼|彼女}の同盟者の間でも高まった。
languages.original_text: Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の動向に唖然としていた民衆は、ロード・キャプテンが他の競争者を抜き去り、レースで勝利するのを畏敬の念を持って見守る。自由開拓者の評判は、庶民の間でも{mf|彼|彼女}の同盟者の間でも高まった。

languages.text: 行商浪人亲自参赛的消息让所有人大吃一惊。人们怀着敬畏之情，看着行商浪人在比赛中不断战胜其他对手，最终拨得头筹。行商浪人越发威名远播，无论{mf|他|她}的臣民还是盟友，都对{mf|他|她}敬畏有加。
languages.original_text: Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人亲自参赛的消息让所有人大吃一惊。人们怀着敬畏之情，看着行商浪人在比赛中不断战胜其他对手，最终拨得头筹。行商浪人越发威名远播，无论{mf|他|她}的臣民还是盟友，都对{mf|他|她}敬畏有加。

languages.text: Estupefacta por la atención de su Comerciante Independiente, la gente observa asombrada como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán supera a los otros competidores y gana la carrera. La reputación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente crece, tanto entre la gente normal como sus aliados.
languages.original_text: Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.

traits.locale_text: Estupefacta por la atención de su Comerciante Independiente, la gente observa asombrada como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán supera a los otros competidores y gana la carrera. La reputación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente crece, tanto entre la gente normal como sus aliados.

languages.text: Völlig verblüfft ob der Aufmerksamkeit {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sehen die Leute ehrfürchtig zu, wie der Lord Captain die anderen Teilnehmer überholt und das Rennen gewinnt. Das Ansehen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wächst, sowohl beim einfachen Volk als auch bei {mf|seinen|ihren} Verbündeten.
languages.original_text: Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.

traits.locale_text: Völlig verblüfft ob der Aufmerksamkeit {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sehen die Leute ehrfürchtig zu, wie der Lord Captain die anderen Teilnehmer überholt und das Rennen gewinnt. Das Ansehen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wächst, sowohl beim einfachen Volk als auch bei {mf|seinen|ihren} Verbündeten.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in ilgisiyle serseme dönen halk, Lord Kaptan'ın diğer yarışmacıları geride bırakarak yarışın galibi oluşunu hayranlıkla izliyor. Hür Tacir'in itibarı, hem sıradan halk hem de müttefikleri arasında artıyor.
languages.original_text: Stupefied by the Rogue Trader's attention, the people watch in awe as the Lord Captain overtakes the other competitors and prevails in the race. The Rogue Trader's reputation grows, both among the common folk and with {mf|his|her} allies.
